name: Building a new hOMe
description: "Building a new hOMe" is a simple story of how dreams manifest into reality. The five lovable monsters: Sawd, Arzee, Friz, DouLou and Marth, represent the elements in the body: Ether, Air, Fire, Water and Earth. They decide to build a new hOMe (OM - the divine which manifests as all that is) and succeed at it, having fun and discovering each other's qualities along the way. This book is for all ages to enjoy by reading, listening, viewing and experiencing the story together. This is a series of 100 books. These 100 books will be signed by ME and NUMBERED 1/100... shipping is going to be 3 dollars. Photos by: Natasha Mishano (www.mishanophotography.com)
